item.description:
Hello Boston,

BPO invites you to an exclusive BPO Bollywood Night – Punjabi Style at Mantra Restaurant / Lounge on Friday, May 3rd, 2013.

There is no better way to celebrate the warm weather than to dance to the tunes played by the BIGGEST and the BEST Bollywood DJ in the East Coast, DeeJay Bunty. Get crazy with a fusion of nostalgia as Bunty remixes the classics and newest hits: Bollywood and Bhangra music.

We have a special $10 cover for all those who RSVP via email and arrive before 10.30 PM. You can RSVP with your guest names to bpobollywood@gmail.com.

Please note we have limited spots and guests with RSVP’s will be given priority. Bottle service and VIP tables are available. Email us for more info.

Mantra is located in the heart of downtown Boston, accessible to MBTA (Green, Red, Orange & Silver lines) and parking garages. Plenty of street parking is available if you arrive early.

Time: 9 PM to 1 AM.
Dress Code: No shorts/hats/t-shirts/sneakers. Dress to impress.

Don't forget to join us on Facebook (www.1bpo.org) to stay updated with all our events and early bird specials.

Best,

BPO
item.name: BPO Bollywood Night – Punjabi Style
